title.rendered: RUNVA EWL12000 12V WINCH WITH SYNTHETIC ROPE

content.rendered:
RUNVA EWL12000 12V WINCH WITH SYNTHETIC ROPE

Runva EWL12000 12V Winch with synthetic rope available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

The Runva EWL12000 is the perfect entry level winch. With a massive 12,000lb line pull, this will easily get you out of trouble.

The EWL12000 fits all 4X4 winch bars on the market today which takes the guesswork out of it and makes it a great option for your vehicle. The EWL12000 features automatic braking via the screw cone brake system. The gearbox is a three stage full steel planetary setup with a sliding ring gear clutch which is strong and efficient.

This winch includes several accessories which is also featured with Runva’s premium models. So if you are looking for something strong and reliable but on a budget – this is the winch for you.

Specifications:

  • Rated Line Pull: 12,000LB (5,443KG)
  • Motor: (12V) 4.6KW/6.1HP
  • Gear Train: Full Steel 3 Stage Planetary
  • Gear Ratio: 265:1
  • Clutch Type: Sliding Ring Gear
  • Clutch Handle Position: Gearbox can be rotated
  • Brake: Automatic Load Holding in Drum
  • Cable Type: Synthetic Rope
  • Cable Size: 10MM X 25M
  • Drum Size: 63MM X 226MM
  • Mounting Bolt Pattern: 254MM X 114.3MM
  • Overall Dimensions: 542MM X 114.3MM X 199MM
  • Remote Control: Heavy Duty Handheld + Wireless
  • Battery Leads: 2X 1.8M Heavy Duty Leads
  • Finish: Black Powder Coat
  • Warranty: Limited 5 Year Electrical and Lifetime Mechanical Warranty

To view the full range of recovery products available, CLICK HERE!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
